info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Davie and northeastern Iredell Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Mocksville, or 4 miles east of Harmony, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mocksville, Bermuda Run, Harmony, Fork Church, Advance, Sheffield, Farmington, Olin and Turnersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
